topic.description: This topic is to check health of chassis fan

rule.description: This rule collects chassis fan statistics periodically and notifies in case of anomalies

sensor.description: iAgent sensor using show-chassis-fan command to collect data from network device

trigger.description: Sets health based on chassis fan status and speed.

topic.description: This topic monitors fpc memory, cpu and temperatures

rule.description: This rule collects fpc cpu statistics periodically and notifies in case of anomalies

sensor.description: /components open-config sensor to collect telemetry data from network device

field.description: This field is to parse all fpc names
This field is to show fpc cpu utilization
This field is for fpc cpu higher threshold value
This field is for fpc cpu lower threshold value

trigger.description: Sets health based on fpc cpu utilization threshold.

status.message: $fpc CPU utilization($fpc-cpu-utilization) is lesser than lower threshold($fpc-cpu-utilization-lower-threshold)
$fpc CPU utilization($fpc-cpu-utilization) is greater than higher threshold($fpc-cpu-utilization-higher-threshold)

variable.name: FPC_CPU_Utilization_Higher_Threshold
variable.description: Enter fpc cpu maximum threshold value

variable.name: FPC_CPU_Utilization_Lower_Threshold
variable.description: Enter fpc cpu minimum threshold value

variable.name: FPC_Slot_No
variable.description: Enter fpc slot numbers to be monitored using regular epression

rule.description: This rule collects fpc memory statistics periodically and notifies in case of anomalies

sensor.description: /components open-config sensor to collect telemetry data from network device

field.description: This field is to set fpc buffer memory higher threshold
This field is to set fpc buffer memory lower threshold
This field is to parse fpc solt number
This field is to set fpc buffer memory utilization
This field is to set fpc buffer heap memory
This field is to set fpc heap memory higher threshold
This field is to set fpc buffer memory lower threshold

trigger.description: Sets health based on fpc memory utilization threshold.

status.message: $fpc memory buffer utilization($fpc-memory-buffer) is below lower threshold($buffer-lower-threshold)
$fpc memory buffer utilization($fpc-memory-buffer) is in medium range(>=$buffer-lower-threshold, <=$buffer-higher-threshold)
$fpc memory buffer utilization($fpc-memory-buffer) is above higher threshold($buffer-higher-threshold)

trigger.description: Sets health based on fpc heap memory utilization threshold.

status.message: $fpc memory heap utilization($fpc-memory-heap) is below lower threshold($heap-lower-threshold)
$fpc memory heap utilization($fpc-memory-heap) is in medium range(>=$heap-lower-threshold, <=$heap-higher-threshold)
$fpc memory heap utilization($fpc-memory-heap) is above higher threshold($heap-higher-threshold)

variable.name: FPC_Buffer_Higher_Threshold
variable.description: Enter processes fpc buffer memory maximum threshold value

variable.name: FPC_Buffer_Lower_Threshold
variable.description: Enter processes fpc buffer memory minimum threshold value

variable.name: FPC_Heap_Higher_Threshold
variable.description: Enter processes fpc heap memory maximum threshold value

variable.name: FPC_Heap_Lower_Threshold
variable.description: Enter processes fpc heap memory minimum threshold value

variable.name: FPC_Slot_No
variable.description: Enter fpc slot numbers to be monitored with separator using regular expression

rule.description: This rule collects fpc current temperature periodically and notifies in case of anomalies

sensor.description: /components open-config sensor to collect telemetry data from network device

field.description: This field is to parse all fpc names
This field shows fpc temparature to be monitored
This field is for fpc temparature higher threshold value
This field is for fpc temparature lower threshold value

trigger.description: Sets health based on fpc temperature threshold.

variable.name: FPC_Slot_No
variable.description: Enter fpc slot numbers to be monitored with separator using regular expression

variable.name: FPC_Temperature_Higher_Threshold
variable.description: Enter processes fpc temparature maximum threshold value

variable.name: FPC_Temperature_Lower_Threshold
variable.description: Enter processes fpc temparature minimum threshold value

topic.description: This topic monitors PEM, zones and overall system power usage

rule.description: This rule collects chassis PEM power usage statistics periodically and notifies in case of anomalies

function.description: calculates % of power usage out of total available

sensor.description: /components open-config sensor to collect telemetry data from network device

field.description: stores fru model number
stores % of power usage by PEMs using udf
Set pem power usage threshold
stores all available PEM slots
stores state of PEMs
stores max power capacity for PEMs
stores power input state of PEMs
stores power being used by PEMs
stores temperature status of PEMs

trigger.description: Sets health based on PEM power usage.
Sets health based on PEM state.
Sets health based on PEM temperature threshold.

trigger.synopsis: chassis power DC input state kpi
trigger.description: Sets health based on power DC input state.

variable.name: pem_power_usage_threshold
variable.description: Enter PEM power usage threshold value

rule.description: This rule collects chassis system power usage statistics periodically and notifies in case of anomalies

function.description: calculates % of power usage out of total available

sensor.description: /components open-config sensor to collect telemetry data from network device

field.description: stores power system capacity
stores max power available for system
stores remaining power for system
stores remaining power for system using udf
Set pem power usage threshold

trigger.description: Sets health based on system power usage threshold.

status.message: System power usage abnormal!!! only $system-power-remaining-in-percentage % of power is remaining
System power usage is normal $system-power-remaining-in-percentage % of power is remaining

variable.name: system_power_usage_threshold
variable.description: Enter PEM power usage threshold value

rule.description: Sets health based on zone power usage threshold.

function.description: calculates % of power usage out of total available

sensor.description: Netconf rpc used to collect telemetry data from network device

field.description: stores % of zone power used using udf
Set pem power usage threshold

variable.name: zone_power_usage_threshold
variable.description: Enter PEM power usage threshold value

topic.description: This topic is to monitor the chassis, RE and RE-CPU teparatures

rule.description: This rule collects chassis temperature periodically and notifies in case of anomalies

sensor.description: /components open-config sensor to collect telemetry data from network device

field.description: stores chassis name
This field is for chassis ambient temparature maximum threshold value
This field is for chassis temparature minimum threshold value
stores ambient temperature of chassis

trigger.description: Sets health based on chassis temperature.

variable.name: chassis_temperature_higher_threshold
variable.description: Enter chassis temparature maximum threshold value

variable.name: chassis_temperature_lower_threshold
variable.description: Enter chassis temparature minimum threshold value

rule.description: This rule collects RE cpu temperature periodically and notifies in case of anomalies

sensor.description: /components open-config sensor to collect telemetry data from network device

field.description: This field is to parse re cpu temparature
This field is for re cpu temparature maximum threshold value
This field is for re cpu temparature minimum threshold value
This field is for RE identification

trigger.description: Sets health based on RE cpu temperature threshold.

status.message: $route-engine cpu temperature($re-cpu-temperature) is lesser than lower threshold($re-cpu-temperature-lower-threshold)
$route-engine cpu temperature($re-cpu-temperature) is greater than higher threshold($re-cpu-temperature-higher-threshold)

variable.name: RE_CPU_Temperature_Higher_Threshold
variable.description: Enter re cpu temparature maximum threshold value

variable.name: RE_CPU_Temperature_Lower_Threshold
variable.description: Enter re cpu temparature minimum threshold value

variable.name: RE_Slot_No
variable.description: Enter RE numbers to be monitored using regular expression

rule.description: This rule collects RE temperature periodically and notifies in case of anomalies

sensor.description: /components open-config sensor to collect telemetry data from network device

field.description: This field is to parse re temparature
This field is for re temparature maximum threshold value
This field is for re temparature minimum threshold value
This field is for re identification

trigger.description: Sets health based on RE cpu temperature threshold.

variable.name: RE_Slot_No
variable.description: Enter RE numbers using regular expression

variable.name: RE_Temperature_Higher_Threshold
variable.description: Enter RE temperature higher threshold value

variable.name: RE_Temperature_Lower_Threshold
variable.description: Enter RE temperature lower threshold value

playbook.description: This playbook monitors chassis temperatures&power, fpc temperature, memory&cpu utilization and notify in case any of the health monitored field crosses threshld
